Texts.Chs: 我和我的船员们一直在小行星上采矿，直到我们在附近发现了一艘特尔提勒飞船。在匆忙中，我的船员忘记接我，从那以后我就被困在这里了...^green;你能给我一个^orange;阿威坎发射器^green;吗？，这样我的船员们就能来把我接走了。
Texts.Eng: My crew and I were mining asteroids until we discovered a Thell ship in the neighbourhood. In their hurry, my crew forgot to pick me up, and I've been stuck here ever since... ^green;Could you get me an ^orange;Avikan Transmitter ^green;so I can call my crew for a pick up?

Texts.Chs: 回到位于^orange;远星庇护所^reset;的^orange;雅兰^reset;处
谢谢你带给我这个，现在我可以联系我的船员然后安排他们来接我！来，拿着这个我随身带着的多余头盔，这是你应得的！
Texts.Eng: Thank you for bringing me this, now I can contact my crew and arrange for a pick up! Here, take this extra helmet I had lying around, you've earned it!
